constraints.name: prefix_constraint
constraints.description: 数组的第一个元素必须等于剩余元素的个数减一（即 b1 = m - 1）

constraints.name: subarray_partition
constraints.description: 数组 b2, b3, ..., bm 可以被分割成 b1 个非空子数组，每个子数组都是一个测试（满足 b1 = m - 1 的条件）
constraints.formal: b[1:] can be partitioned into b[0] non-empty subarrays, each satisfying the test condition

constraints.name: operation_count
constraints.description: 函数 f 定义为将数组 b1, b2, ..., bm 转换为多测试所需的最小操作次数，每次操作可以将任意 bi 替换为任意非负整数 x
constraints.formal: f(b) = min number of operations to make b a multitest, where each operation is replacing any b[i] with any non-negative integer x
